content: I greatly appreciate your valuable comments Susan Rooks. People with mental illness and other disability-related impairments should be judged by the content of their character — to quote MLK — as well as their ability and God-given talents as employees. As noted in the image contained in the article “bias attitudes,” myths, fears and stereotypes are the real disabilities. Thank you again for providing important insights on this important issue. I’m grateful for your positive engagement. And, yes, the stigma must end! #EndtheStigma (let’s connect on Twitter, Susan).
